privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.dataProtectionDesc: This application is committed to protecting your personal data and ensuring your privacy. This privacy policy explains how your data is collected, used, and protected.
privacyPolicy.collectedDataList:
• Account information (email address, full name)
• Clothing photos and information
• Location data (for weather information)
• App usage data
• Style preferences and settings
privacyPolicy.dataUsageList:
• Provide personalized outfit recommendations
• Display weather information
• Improve app performance
• Enhance user experience
• Provide technical support
privacyPolicy.dataSecurityDesc: Your data is stored encrypted in Firebase's secure infrastructure. Personal information is not shared with third parties and is only accessible by you.
privacyPolicy.userRightsDesc:
• Right to access your data
• Right to rectify data
• Right to delete data
• Right to data portability
• Right to object to processing
privacyPolicy.dataRetentionDesc: Your personal data is retained until you delete your account or as required by legal obligations. When you delete your account, all your data is permanently removed.
privacyPolicy.cookiesDesc: The app uses local storage to save user preferences and session information. This data is stored on your device and does not affect personal privacy.
privacyPolicy.thirdPartyDesc:
The app uses the following third-party services:
• Firebase (Google) - Authentication and data storage
• OpenWeatherMap - Weather information
These services have their own privacy policies.
privacyPolicy.contactDesc: If you have questions about our privacy policy, you can contact us at brcryhngl254@gmail.com.
privacyPolicy.changesDesc: This privacy policy may be updated from time to time. Significant changes will be announced through in-app notifications.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Use
termsOfService.acceptanceDesc: By using this application, you are deemed to have accepted the following terms of use. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use the application.
termsOfService.serviceDescriptionDesc: Closet Weather is a mobile application that helps users organize their clothes and get outfit recommendations suitable for weather conditions.
termsOfService.userResponsibilitiesDesc:
• Keep your account information secure
• Ensure uploaded content is appropriate
• Use the app for legal purposes
• Respect other users' rights
• Do not harm the technical infrastructure
termsOfService.prohibitedUsesDesc:
• Sharing illegal content
• Uploading inappropriate or disturbing content
• Copyright infringement
• Sending spam or harmful content
• Compromising system security
termsOfService.intellectualPropertyDesc: All rights to the app's design, code, and features are reserved. Users may only use app content for personal use.
termsOfService.disclaimerDesc: The app is provided 'as is'. Weather information and outfit recommendations are for informational purposes only. Accuracy is not guaranteed.
termsOfService.limitationsDesc: The app provider is not responsible for direct or indirect damages arising from the use of the application.
termsOfService.terminationDesc: Accounts violating terms of use may be temporarily or permanently suspended. Users can close their accounts at any time.
termsOfService.changesDesc: These terms of use may be updated from time to time. Updates will be announced through in-app notifications.
termsOfService.governingLawDesc: These terms are subject to the laws of the Republic of Turkey and are under the jurisdiction of Turkish courts.
termsOfService.contactDesc: For questions about terms of use, you can contact us at brcryhngl254@gmail.com.

helpAndSupport.title: Help & Support
helpAndSupport.description: Contact us for your questions. We will try to get back to you as soon as possible.
helpAndSupport.emailTemplate:
Hello BNG Support Team,

I need help with the following:

[Please describe your issue here]

Device Information:
- Platform: {platform}
- App Version: 1.0.0

Thank you,
helpAndSupport.emailError: Could not send email. Please manually write to {email}.
helpAndSupport.contactDirectDesc: You can write directly to the following email address:

faqContent.a1: BNG creates your digital wardrobe by taking photos of your clothes. It suggests suitable outfits using weather data.
faqContent.a2: Tap the '+' button on the home page, take a photo or select from gallery. Colors are automatically detected, then add type, season and other details.
faqContent.a3: AI analyzes colors, types of your clothes and weather conditions to suggest suitable outfits. It also considers your style preferences.
faqContent.a4: We get current weather data from OpenWeatherMap service. If you give location permission, it shows weather for your location.
faqContent.a5: Yes! All your data is stored encrypted in Firebase. Personal information is not shared with third parties.
faqContent.a6: Basic features work offline, but internet connection is required for weather updates and new outfit suggestions.
faqContent.q7: How do I delete my account?
faqContent.a7: You can contact us through Settings > Privacy Policy section to request account deletion.
faqContent.q8: Which platforms does the app work on?
faqContent.a8: It works on Android devices. Minimum Android 6.0 required.

howToUseContent.title: App Usage Guide
howToUseContent.step1Desc: Register with email or sign in with your Google account.
howToUseContent.step2Desc: Select your style preferences from the profile section (casual, formal, sporty, etc.).
howToUseContent.step3Desc: Use the '+' button on home page to photograph your clothes and build your wardrobe.
howToUseContent.step4Desc: Grant location permission for weather or manually select your city.
howToUseContent.step5Desc: See your daily outfit recommendations on the home page and select the ones you like.
howToUseContent.step6Desc: View, edit and delete your clothes from the My Closets section.
howToUseContent.tip1: • Add different seasonal clothes for better suggestions
howToUseContent.tip2: • Photograph clothes in good lighting for color detection
howToUseContent.tip3: • Update style preferences to get different suggestions
howToUseContent.tip4: • Try different combinations for special occasions
